# Introduction

Just a sentence to check that git works from my virtual PC.
I think it`s fixed now. Merge conflict opens in RStudio editor also on PC.

```{r}
set.seed(5566)
x <- data.frame(x=rnorm(1000000, mean = 2, sd = 1))
```
